metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3671 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
A null pointer de-reference was found in the way samba kerberos server handled missing sname in TGS-REQ (Ticket Granting Server - Request). An authenticated user could use this flaw to crash the samba server.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3671` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
heimdal-kcm - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
